death_place.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总医院第四医学中心
death_place.en: The Fourth Medical Center of PLA General Hospital

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物刘少奇与王前之子。1966年下放至北京延庆山区教书，文化大革命结束后在北京国家科学技术协会工作，改革开放后曾到广西等地从事经济管理工作。1996年至2006年任长沙市商业银行北区支行副行长。
description.en: Son of Chinese politician Liu Shaoqi and Wang Qian. He was sent to teach in the Yanqing mountainous area of Beijing in 1966. After the Cultural Revolution, he worked at the China Association for Science and Technology in Beijing. Following the Reform and Opening-up, he engaged in economic management in Guangxi and other places. From 1996 to 2006, he served as the vice president of the North District Sub-branch of the Changsha Commercial Bank.

description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义理论家、革命家、政治家，曾任中华人民共和国主席。在文化大革命期间受到批判和迫害。
description.en: A Chinese Marxist theorist, revolutionary, and politician who served as the Chairman of the People's Republic of China. He was criticized and persecuted during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇的第四任妻子，刘允真和刘涛之母。
description.en: The fourth wife of Liu Shaoqi, and the mother of Liu Yunzhen and Liu Tao.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国陕西省的城市，是中国共产党在20世纪30年代和40年代的革命根据地。
description.en: A city in Shaanxi province, China, which was the revolutionary base for the Chinese Communist Party in the 1930s and 1940s.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所著名中学。
description.en: A well-known middle school located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京郊区良乡的一所农业技术学校。
description.en: An agricultural technical school located in Liangxiang, a suburb of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇与王前之女，刘允真的姐姐。
description.en: Daughter of Liu Shaoqi and Wang Qian, and the elder sister of Liu Yunzhen.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的一场大规模政治运动。
description.en: A large-scale political movement that took place in China from 1966 to 1976.

en: China Association for Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术工作者的群众组织。
description.en: A mass organization for Chinese scientists and technologists.

description.zh-cn: 指1978年起在中国推行的经济改革和对外开放政策。
description.en: Refers to the economic reform and opening-up policies implemented in China starting from 1978.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省长沙市的一家区域性股份制商业银行。
description.en: A regional joint-stock commercial bank in Changsha, Hunan Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 刘允真是刘少奇的儿子。
description.en: Liu Yunzhen is the son of Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 刘允真是王前的儿子。
description.en: Liu Yunzhen is the son of Wang Qian.

description.zh-cn: 王前是刘少奇的第四任妻子。
description.en: Wang Qian was the fourth wife of Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 刘允真于1946年7月生于延安。
description.en: Liu Yunzhen was born in Yan'an in July 1946.

description.zh-cn: 1962年毕业于北京101中学。
description.en: Graduated from Beijing 101 Middle School in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 1962年考入北京郊区的良乡农业技术学校。
description.en: Enrolled in Liangxiang Agricultural Technical School in the suburbs of Beijing in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 刘允真是刘涛的弟弟。
description.en: Liu Yunzhen is the younger brother of Liu Tao.

description.zh-cn: 1967年，和姐姐刘涛一同书写大字报《造刘少奇的反，跟着毛主席干一辈子革命》和《看！刘少奇的丑恶灵魂》，揭发刘少奇。
description.en: In 1967, along with his sister Liu Tao, he wrote big-character posters titled 'Rebel against Liu Shaoqi, Follow Chairman Mao for a Lifetime of Revolution' and 'Look! Liu Shaoqi's Vile Soul' to denounce Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 1967年，和弟弟刘允真一同书写大字报《造刘少奇的反，跟着毛主席干一辈子革命》和《看！刘少奇的丑恶灵魂》，揭发刘少奇。
description.en: In 1967, along with her brother Liu Yunzhen, she wrote big-character posters titled 'Rebel against Liu Shaoqi, Follow Chairman Mao for a Lifetime of Revolution' and 'Look! Liu Shaoqi's Vile Soul' to denounce Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命结束后在北京国家科学技术协会工作。
description.en: Worked at the China Association for Science and Technology in Beijing after the Cultural Revolution ended.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放政策为刘允真提供了到广西等地从事经济管理工作的机会。
description.en: The Reform and Opening-up policy provided Liu Yunzhen with the opportunity to engage in economic management work in Guangxi and other places.

position.en: Vice President of North District Sub-branch

description.zh-cn: 1996年至2006年，担任湖南省长沙市商业银行北区支行副行长。
description.en: From 1996 to 2006, he served as the Vice President of the North District Sub-branch of Changsha Commercial Bank in Hunan Province.
